restarter.partial_crash_warn: Due to a partial crash, this server will restart in 1 minute. Please disconnect now.
restarter.partial_crash_warn_discord: Due to a partial crash, **%{servername}** will restart in 1 minute.
restarter.schedule_warn: This server is scheduled to restart in %{smart_count} minute. Please disconnect now. |||| This server is scheduled to restart in %{smart_count} minutes.
restarter.schedule_warn_discord: **%{servername}** is scheduled to restart in %{smart_count} minute. |||| **%{servername}** is scheduled to restart in %{smart_count} minutes.
